summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of the intersection of Rainier Avenue and McClellan Street over and across a portion of Lot 11, Block 1, Rainier Valley Addition, in conformity with the existing curb grades; providing for the acquisition appropriation, taking, and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, by purchase or condemnation, and providing for the payment therefor.
